about_the_game:
The Game
Venture into a magical world as Rad, the town’s local butthead, as he begrudgingly completes his community service. You’ll be able to explore whimsical locations using Rad’s innate powers and unlockable abilities . Take on kick-butt bosses against the Synergy Sisters as you unintentionally foil their plans.

The Story
In the town of scenic Vistabell, a rebellious youth named Rad finds himself in a bind with the law. As if being forced to complete community service wasn't bad enough, he has a run-in with a mysterious thief who has the ability to erase magic - the world's life source. In order to repay his debt to society, Rad is tasked with tracking down the thief, collecting the powerful McGuffinite crystals, and fighting the sinister Synergy Sisters.


Features
Venture into a variety of locations and settings on your way to completing your community service:
Explore an expansive and evolving hub world, unique exploration levels, and challenging boss gauntlets.
Walk from one level to the next with no loading screens.
Fast-Travel Teleporter Pads get you where you've already been instantly!

Having floating hands can be useful, utilize them to the fullest with unique platforming abilities:
Chain together sprints, jumps, hovers, and grapples to help you traverse the world.
Discover collectables, take on challenges, and unlock new abilities to help you on your adventure.
Upgrade your abilities and gadgets to explore more treacherous locations.

But wait, there's more!
Take on obstacle courses and combat challenges in the Augmented Reality Arena.
Face-off against challenging boss battles.
Unlock unique and hilarious alternate outfits.

content_descriptors.notes: This demo shows depiction of tobacco consumption, including characters smoking cigarettes and cigars.
